skilllist.skilldesc:
Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.
<font color="a6aafb">Renner</font> Basic Attack - Longshot: Fire a powerful shot in the enemy's current direction, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+365% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+400% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first target hit (this shot can be dodged, and blocked by others). Deals 75% damage to Creeps.<font color="a6aafb">Bennett</font> Basic Attack - Area Bombing: Bombard an area, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+232% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+330% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies in range and slowing them by 40% for 0.5s. Deals 75% damage to Creeps.<font color="a6aafb">Wesker</font> Basic Attack - Proximity Advantage: Fire 5 shots at the target, each dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+178% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (inherits a portion of Attack Effects). Damage dealt to targets hit multiple times will decay to 25%. Deals 75% damage to Creeps.<font color="a6aafb">Nibiru</font> Basic Attack - Rapid Fire: Lets loose a volley of 4 shots at the target, each shot dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+51% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (inherits a portion of Attack Effects). Deals 75% damage to Creeps.
Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> by 5.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate.
Beatrix rolls forward while fully reloading her current weapon.

Beatrix calmly sets up <font color="a6aafb">Renner</font> on the battlefield and takes aim. When releasing the skill, she deals 700<font color="fba51f"> (+280% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit.

Beatrix can aim for up to 8s, and she can cancel it early to reduce the cooldown by 50%.

This shot can penetrate Minions and only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

Having escaped battle for 3s, Beatrix can call for her butler Morgan to provide her with a backup weapons crate.
Beatrix must then choose two from the crate to serve as her primary and secondary weapons.
Her weapon selection is interrupted if she commits any action or is controlled during this period.

Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.
<font color="a6aafb">Bennett</font> Basic Attack - Area Bombing: Bombard an area, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+232% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+330% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies in range and slowing them by 40% for 0.5s (deals 75% damage to Creeps).
Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> by 5.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate.
Beatrix leaps nimbly forward, and fully reloads her current weapon.

Beatrix focuses her rage and has <font color="a6aafb">Bennett</font> rain down a bombardment on the target area 5 time(s). Each bombardment slows enemies by 40% and deals 580<font color="fba51f"> (+225% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (this damage decays to 20% when hitting the same target multiple times), lasting 1s.

This skill only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

Having escaped battle for 3s, Beatrix can call for her butler Morgan to provide her with a backup weapons crate.
Beatrix must then choose two from the crate to serve as her primary and secondary weapons.
Her weapon selection is interrupted if she commits any action or is controlled during this period.

Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.
<font color="a6aafb">Wesker</font> Basic Attack - Proximity Advantage: Fire 5 shots at the target, each dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+178% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (inherits a portion of Attack Effects). Damage dealt to targets hit multiple times will decay to 25%. Deals 75% damage to Creeps.
Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> by 5.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate.
Beatrix rolls ahead sideways, and fully reloads her current weapon.

Beatrix raises <font color="a6aafb">Wesker</font> and fires off ultra bullets that deal 350<font color="fba51f"> (+155% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> each time they hit an enemy (the damage of subsequent hits on the same enemy will decay to 25%).

This skill only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

Having escaped battle for 3s, Beatrix can call for her butler Morgan to provide her with a backup weapons crate.
Beatrix must then choose two from the crate to serve as her primary and secondary weapons.
Her weapon selection is interrupted if she commits any action or is controlled during this period.

Her extraordinary talent in the field of mechanics allowed Beatrix to produce 4 weapon(s) of truly awe-inspiring firepower.
<font color="a6aafb">Nibiru</font> Basic Attack - Rapid Fire: Lets loose a volley of 4 shots at the target, each shot dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+51% Total Physical Attack)</font> -<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (inherits a portion of Attack Effects). Deals 75% damage to Creeps.
Beatrix cannot Crit, and converts every 1% Critical Chance gained into 2 Physical Attack.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Beatrix can carry 2 weapons at once, and increase her <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> by 5.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Beatrix takes 0.5s to swap her primary weapon with the secondary she has slung over her back, gaining an all-new way to attack and Ultimate.
Beatrix slides forward, and fully reloads her current weapon.

Beatrix unleashes 10 volleys of bullets using <font color="a6aafb">Nibiru</font>, each dealing 130<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

This skill only deals 75% damage to non-hero units.

Having escaped battle for 3s, Beatrix can call for her butler Morgan to provide her with a backup weapons crate.
Beatrix must then choose two from the crate to serve as her primary and secondary weapons.
Her weapon selection is interrupted if she commits any action or is controlled during this period.

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Attack-focused with some Attack Speed. Any weapon can be useful.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Basic Attacks slow enemies by <%Num1> and reduce their Attack Speed by <%Num2>.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s (each Basic Attack reduces it by <Num5>s, down to <Num6>s)[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+15% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equiptips:
+160 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

equiplist.equipskill1: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% Attack Speed for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Lifesteal
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: GEEK CADERAA
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

recommendmasterplan.name: S2G Esports Sigibum
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Beatrix works best with tank heroes with good CC abilities, as they can help improve the accuracy of Beatrix's skills. Like Khufra and Atlas.

strong.desc: Beatrix is strong against heroes without movement abilities, as they can be easily hit by her skills, such as Hylos and Belerick.

weak.desc: Beatrix is countered by high burst damage heroes with strong single-target CC, as they can catch her with a CC and burst her down. Such as Eudora and Ling.
